decks.notes: The main concept of this deck revolves around assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant, Urza's Mine) to generate massive amounts of mana and play powerful threats such as Karn Liberated, Karn, the Great Creator, and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck also includes cards like Sylvan Scrying and Expedition Map to help find the UrzaTron lands quickly, as well as versatile removal options like Oblivion Stone. The strategy is to control the game early on with removal and ramp, then overwhelm the opponent with large threats in the mid to late game.
